examples: Asper Argo, the Well-Beloved, Commdor of the Korellian Republic greeted his wife’s entry by a hangdog lowering of his scanty eyebrows. To her at least, his self-adopted epithet did not apply. Even he knew that.
Synonyms: sneak, gallows bird; see also Thesaurus:gallows bird

verbs.description: hangdog (third-person singular simple present hangdogs, present participle hangdogging, simple past and past participle hangdogged)

entries.meaning: To move or loiter in a sneaking or ashamed manner.
examples: With a twenty-one to three victory, Pinewood high-stepped it off the field while our Falcons hangdogged their way to the locker room.
